original_text: The main hall had a rectangular doorframe, and the one at the front of the Most Holy Place was similar.
korean_text: 외전 문설주는 네모졌고 내전 전면에 있는 양식은 이러하니

sentences.original_text: The main hall had a rectangular doorframe
sentences.korean_translation: 본 홀은 직사각형의 문틀을 가지고 있었다

sentences.original_text: and the one at the front of the Most Holy Place
